Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.2 Sahetukaduka » 1.2.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 1.2.5.1 Paccayānuloma » 1.2.5.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Anantarādi
Hetugocchaka
Sahetukaduka
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Anantarādi
90.
244Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sahetuko dhammo uppajjati anantarapaccayā…  samanantarapaccayā…  sahajātapaccayā…pe…  vipākapaccayā—  vipākaṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… .
245Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati vipākapaccayā—  vipākaṃ ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  jhānapaccayā…pe…  avigatapaccayā.
<< Adhipatiup1.2.5.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
